gen:link.msg:message: `NumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitSinglePersonHouseholds` MUST also be reported, because at least one of the underlying values of `NumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitSinglePersonHouseholds` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsSinglePersonHouseholdsHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfNumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitSinglePersonHouseholds')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsSinglePersonHouseholdsHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfNumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitSinglePersonHouseholds return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsSinglePersonHouseholdsHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_NumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitSinglePersonHouseholds')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsSinglePersonHouseholdsHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_NumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitSinglePersonHouseholds return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitSinglePersonHouseholds` MUST be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsSinglePersonHouseholdsHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_NumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitSinglePersonHouseholds')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsSinglePersonHouseholdsHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_NumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitSinglePersonHouseholds return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsSinglePersonHouseholdsHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_ChildrenOfNumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitSinglePersonHouseholds')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsSinglePersonHouseholdsHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_ChildrenOfNumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitSinglePersonHouseholds return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
